0.text: Innate - Living Weapon: Upon gaining a set amount of permanent stats from items and stat growth, Kai'Sa can evolve the related basic ability after being in cast time for 2 seconds. The upgrade is lost if the stat requirement is no longer met.

1.text: Innate - Plasma: Kai'Sa's basic attacks  on-hit and  Void Seeker apply stacks of Plasma to enemies that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent stacks and stacks up to 4 times. Her and nearby allies'  immobilizing effects and  polymorphs against enemy  champions will also apply Plasma.

2.text: Innate - Caustic Wounds: Plasma stacks applied by Kai'Sa's basic attacks or  Void Seeker deal 4 − 16 (based on level) (+ 1 − 8 (based on level) per Plasma stack before application) (+ 15% − 25% (based on Plasma stacks before application) AP) bonus magic damage. Her next stack against a target with 4 Plasma will instead consume them to deal an additional 15% (+ 5% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, capped at 400 against  monsters.

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa releases a swarm of 6 missiles that evenly distributes among nearby  visible enemies, each one hitting their target after 0.4 seconds and dealing physical damage.  Minions below  35% health take double damage.

1.text: Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.

2.text: Living Weapon: Requires 「  100 − 66 (based on level) attack damage from items 」「  100 attack damage from items and stat growth 」 to upgrade – Icathian Rain instead fires 12 missiles.

3.text: A nearby enemy is required to cast this ability.

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit, applying 2 Plasma, and  revealing them for 4 seconds.

1.text: Living Weapon: Requires  100 ability power from items to upgrade – Void Seeker applies 3 Plasma instead and  reduces its cooldown by 77% if it hits an enemy  champion.

metaData.0: CAST TIME: 1.2 − 0.6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa charges up over the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on bonus attack speed).

1.text: After completing the cast, Kai'Sa gains  bonus attack speed and her basic attack windup percentage is reduced to 6.44% for 4 seconds.

2.text: Supercharge's  cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds on-attack.

3.text: Living Weapon: Requires「  100% − 70% (based on level) attack speed from items 」「  100% attack speed from items and stat growth 」to upgrade – Supercharge grants  invisibility for 0.5 seconds.

0.text: Active: Kai'Sa instantly  shields herself for 2 seconds and swiftly  dashes to a target location near a  visible enemy champion recently affected by Plasma. The shield's duration refreshes once the dash ends.

1.text: Killer Instinct  resets Kai'Sa's basic attack timer. Kai'Sa can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

consume.originHTML:

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 50 (+ 40% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.

Non-minions take 25% damage from missiles beyond their first.
Living Weapon: Requires 「  100 − 66 (based on level) attack damage from items 」「  100 attack damage from items and stat growth 」 to upgrade – Icathian Rain instead fires 12 missiles.

Active: Kai'Sa fires a void bolt in the target direction that grants  sight around its trajectory as it travels, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit, applying 2 Plasma, and  revealing them for 4 seconds.
After completing the cast, Kai'Sa gains  bonus attack speed and her basic attack windup percentage is reduced to 6.44% for 4 seconds.

0.origin: CAST TIME: 1.2 − 0.6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Kai'Sa charges up over the duration of the cast time, during which she is still allowed to move, becomes  ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on bonus attack speed).

0.origin: CAST TIME: 1.2 − 0.6 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)
